name: Format\Padding
description: The object for defining space around the content in a table cell.

properties.name: bottom
properties.description: The amount of padding between the bottom of the cell and the content, as a number in points or using the available units for components. See .

properties.name: left
properties.description: The amount of padding between the left side of the cell and the content, as a number in points or using the available units for components.See .

properties.name: right
properties.description: The amount of padding between the right side of the cell and the content, as as a number in points or using the available units for components.See .

properties.name: top
properties.description: The amount of padding between the top of the cell and the content, as as a number in points or using the available units for components. See .
